When the view of self grows,

Zhaozhou said,

analyzed: 老僧逐日除二時粥飯是雜用心。

where did this old man end up?
If you can recognize his face here,

If you are not yet able to do this,

original: 當時時退步向自己脚跟下子細推窮。
analyzed: 當時時退步向自己脚跟下子細推窮。
translated: from time to time retreat and carefully investigate at the heels of your own feet.

original: 我能知他人好惡長短底。
analyzed: 我能知他人好惡長短底。
translated: The one who can know the good and bad, long and short of others,
is it ordinary or is it holy?
Is it existent or is it nonexistent?
Investigate to the utmost, investigate again and again.
Until there is no more to investigate,
like a rat entering a bull's horn.
Suddenly the thieving mind is cut off,
and that is precisely the place where the person's four corners collapse.
It is the place to return home and sit securely.
Miaoxi has no choice but to speak this foul language.
When viewed from the perspective of a man who has accomplished things,
it is precisely not knowing good from bad.
It is like shitting and pissing.

original: 忽然撞著箇皮下有血底。
analyzed: 忽然撞著箇皮下有血底。
translated: Suddenly bumping into someone with blood under their skin,
they get a good beating and cannot blame him.
Now that there is no such person,
it is not inconvenient to let this man speak wildly to his heart's content.
This is already not knowing what is good and bad.

original: 不免向泥裏洗土說些沒滋味話。
analyzed: 不免向泥裏洗土說些沒滋味話。

one cannot say they are one.

One cannot say they do not exist.
One, two, existence, non-existence,

analyzed: 於光明藏中亦謂之毒藥。
translated: are also called poison within the treasury of the luminous mind.
They are also called ghee.
Ghee and poison originally have no self-nature.
Those who have the view of one, two, existence, non-existence,
are just medical prescriptions for treating illnesses.
The treasury of the luminous mind is likened to the great void.

original: 一二有無喻日月晝夜。🔽夜暗時太虛空未嘗暗。
analyzed: 一二有無喻日月晝夜。 夜暗時太虛空未嘗暗。
translated: One, two, existence, non-existence are likened to the sun, moon, day and night.🔽When it is dark at night, the great void is never dark.
When it is bright during the day, the great void is never bright.
The sun and moon, day and night, mutually overpower each other.

original: 如一二有無之見相傾相奪。
analyzed: 如一二有無之見相傾相奪。
translated: Like the views of one and two, being and non-being, mutually overpower each other.
Within the luminous treasury, there is no difference.
In the midst of this, there is a heroic person.
Not accepting such evil water being poured on him.

original: 一念緣起無生。🔽只這相傾相奪底。
analyzed: 一念緣起無生。 只這相傾相奪底。
translated: A single thought of the arising of conditions being unborn.

original: 皆是當人逐日受用底家事。
analyzed: 皆是當人逐日受用底家事。
translated: This mutual overpowering is all the daily activities of the person.
As previously mentioned, it is the nectar and poison.
Scholars and officials study this way.
Often seeking quick results.
Before the Chan master has even opened his mouth.
They have already understood with their own thoughts and ideas.

original: 及乎緩緩地根著一似落湯螃蟹手忙脚亂無討頭處。
analyzed: 及乎緩緩地根著一似落湯螃蟹手忙脚亂無討頭處。
translated: Then, when slowly investigating, it is like a crab falling into boiling water, flailing its arms and legs, with no way to find its head.

analyzed: 殊不知閻家老子面前受鐵棒吞熱鐵。
translated: Far from knowing that in front of the Lord of Hell, one receives an iron rod and swallows hot iron.
The one who understands this is precisely this person.
The one who seeks quick results is none other than this person.
It is called hoping to gain but losing instead.
The more refined, the coarser.

original: 如來說為可憐愍者。🔽近世士大夫。
analyzed: 如來說為可憐愍者。 近世士大夫。
translated: The Buddha said they are to be pitied.🔽In recent times, among the ten thousand officials,

It is impossible to find them.
In the fall of the Bingzi year of the Shaoxing era,

original: 經由鄂渚邂逅熊使君叔雅一見傾倒。
analyzed: 經由鄂渚邂逅熊使君叔雅一見傾倒。
translated: while passing through Ehu, I unexpectedly met Prefect Xiong Shuya. At first sight, we hit it off.
We immediately connected through this Way.
He was able to step back and focus on the true essence.
Practicing as he spoke,
unlike those who are superficial,
forcefully understanding, forcefully comprehending, forcefully grasping,

original: 直要到古人脚蹋實地處。
analyzed: 直要到古人脚蹋實地處。
translated: he wanted to reach the place where the ancients stood firmly on the ground.
Not doubting the Buddha,
not doubting Confucius,
not doubting Laozi,

original: 然後借老君孔子佛鼻孔。
analyzed: 然後借老君孔子佛鼻孔。
translated: he then used the noses of Laozi, Confucius, and the Buddha
to breathe out on his own.

original: 真勇猛精進勝丈夫所為。
analyzed: 真勇猛精進勝丈夫所為。
translated: This is truly the work of a valiant and diligent superior man.
I wish he would focus his energy
and strive forward.
In his words and actions, he has already made no mistakes.
He just needs to let out a loud spurt!
If there is progress without retreat,

original: 日用二六時中應緣處不間斷。
analyzed: 日用二六時中應緣處不間斷。
translated: In the daily activities of the six periods of the day, do not interrupt the place of responding to conditions.
Then a sudden breakthrough is not difficult.

original: 然第一不得存心在噴地一下處。
analyzed: 然第一不得存心在噴地一下處。
translated: However, one must not keep one's mind on the place of a sudden breakthrough.
If there is this mind,
Then this mind will block the way.
But in the place of responding to conditions in daily activities, do not be confused.
Then as the days and months pass,
Naturally it will become one piece.
What is the place of responding to conditions?
When happy, when angry,
When judging official matters,
When entertaining guests,
When gathering with wife and children,
When thinking good or evil,
When encountering conditions and circumstances,

original: 皆是噴地一發時節。🔽千萬記取。
analyzed: 皆是噴地一發時節。 千萬記取。
translated: All are the time for a sudden breakthrough.🔽Remember this a thousand times.
Remember this a thousand times.
When worldly thoughts arise,
There is no need to use force to dispel them.
This has already been reported to the emperor.

original: 但只舉僧問趙州狗子還有佛性也無。
analyzed: 但只舉僧問趙州狗子還有佛性也無。
translated: But only raise the monk's question to Zhaozhou: 'Does a dog have Buddha-nature or not?'
Zhaozhou said, 'No.'
As soon as this one word is raised,
worldly emotional thoughts are naturally at ease.
Much speaking is again much error.
Coming from, it turns back and confuses.
A thousand explanations and ten thousand explanations,
it's just this little bit of principle.

original: 驀然於無字上絕却性命。

this principle is also a flower in the eye.🔽Showing Xu the Fiscal Commissioner: Pointing Directly at the Human Mind to See the Nature and Become a Buddha

analyzed: 示徐提刑示徐提刑敦濟此事如青天白日。
translated: This matter is like the blue sky and bright sun.
It is completely pure.
Unchanging and unmoving.
Without decrease or increase.

original: 各各當人日用應緣處。🔽頭頭上明。
analyzed: 各各當人日用應緣處。 頭頭上明。
translated: Each and every person's daily activities and interactions,🔽Clearly manifest in every moment.
Revealed in every thing.
Cannot be grasped.
Always present when let go.
Expansive, unobstructed.
Clearly empty.

original: 如水上放葫蘆。🔽拘牽他不得。
analyzed: 如水上放葫蘆。 拘牽他不得。
translated: Like a gourd floating on water.🔽Cannot be constrained.
Cannot be entangled.
Ancient sages who had the Way,
Obtained it and in the sea of birth and death,
They emerged and submerged,
Fully experiencing it with their entire body,
Without deficiency or excess.
They did not see the appearance of birth and death or afflictions,
Like slicing a piece of sandalwood, every piece is it.
What do you take as birth and death or afflictions?
Where do birth and death and afflictions arise from?

original: 收因結果時却向甚麼處著。
analyzed: 收因結果時却向甚麼處著。
translated: When the causes and effects are gathered, where are they placed?
Since there is no place to put them,
Then the Buddha is an illusion, the Dharma is an illusion.

analyzed: 三界二十五有十二處十八界空蕩蕩地。

Therefore, Fu Dashi said:
Fearing people will have views of annihilation,
Provisionally establish empty names.
People who study the Way should understand this.
You cannot go in one direction.
The causes and conditions of the ancients' entry into the Way.

original: 上求玄求妙求奇特覓解會。
analyzed: 上求玄求妙求奇特覓解會。
translated: Seeking the profound, seeking the wondrous, seeking the extraordinary, seeking understanding,
Unable to see the moon and forget the finger.
Directly cut it in two with one stroke.

original: 永嘉所謂空拳指上生實解。
analyzed: 永嘉所謂空拳指上生實解。
translated: What Yongjia called giving rise to real understanding on the empty fist and finger,
In the Dharma of faculties and objects, they falsely concoct strange things.

analyzed: 於五蘊十二處十八界二十五有塵勞中。
translated: In the five aggregates, twelve sense bases, eighteen elements, and twenty-five existences,
Falsely imprisoning oneself.
What the Tathāgata calls pitiable beings.
One does not see what the Venerable Yantou said.
If you are without desires and without dependence,
You are the Benevolent One.

analyzed: 都來只有一箇父母所生底肉塊子。
translated: In the end, there is only the lump of flesh given birth by one's parents.
When not a single breath comes,
It belongs to others' control.
Apart from the lump of flesh, what else is there?
What do you take to be extraordinary and wondrous?
What do you take to be bodhi and nirvāṇa?
What do you take to be suchness and buddha-nature?
Officials and scholars who want to thoroughly understand this matter,

analyzed: 初不本其實。 只管要於古人公案上。
translated: Do not initially base themselves on reality.
They just want to seek understanding and knowledge from the old cases of the ancients.

original: 直饒爾知盡解盡一大藏教。
analyzed: 直饒爾知盡解盡一大藏教。
translated: Even if you understand and comprehend the entire great canon,

analyzed: 臘月三十日生死到來時。
translated: On the thirtieth day of the last lunar month, when life and death come,
Not a single bit of it will be of any use.
There is another kind [of person].
As soon as they hear a teacher of knowledge speak like this,
They use their mind and consciousness
To speculate and guess, saying,
If it is like this, then won't it fall into emptiness?
Ten out of ten officials and scholars
Have this kind of understanding.
Miaoxi could not help but tell them,
You have not yet attained emptiness,
So why be afraid of it?
It is like a boat that has not yet capsized,
First wanting to jump into the water.
Seeing that they do not understand,
I spare no effort in speaking.
I also draw out a lot of complications for them, saying,
This very fear of falling into emptiness,
Can it be emptied out?
If the eyes are not empty,
what will you use to observe forms?
If the ears are not empty,
what will you use to hear sounds?
If the nose is not empty,
what will you use to know good and bad smells?
If the tongue is not empty,
what will you use to taste flavors?
If the body is not empty,
what will you use to feel touch?
If the mind is not empty,
what will you use to discriminate myriad dharmas?
Hasn't the Buddha said:
No eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.
No forms, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, or dharmas.

original: 乃至十二處十八界二十五有。
analyzed: 乃至十二處十八界二十五有。
translated: Up to the twelve sense fields, eighteen elements, and twenty-five existences.
Up to śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, buddhas,
and the Dharma taught by the Buddha.
Bodhi, nirvāṇa, suchness, buddha-nature,
and those who teach this Dharma and listen to this Dharma.
Those who speak like this,
and those who accept this teaching,
are all completely nonexistent.

analyzed: 得如是了。 喚作空耶。
translated: If one attains this understanding,🔽can it be called empty?
Can it be called not empty?
Is it called Buddha?
Is it called Bodhisattva?
Is it called Śrāvaka?
Is it called Pratyekabuddha?
Is it called Bodhi and Nirvāṇa?
Is it called Suchness and Buddha-nature?

original: 道我聰明靈利不受人謾。
analyzed: 道我聰明靈利不受人謾。
translated: They say they are intelligent and sharp, and will not be deceived by others.
Try to determine this here.
If you can determine it,
you may stay in the grass hut, but you are still outside the gate.
If you cannot determine it,
be careful not to open your big mouth and speak words that go beyond your understanding.
A true man of great capacity,

original: 決欲究竟此一段大事因緣。🔽一等打破。
analyzed: 決欲究竟此一段大事因緣。 一等打破。
translated: if he truly wants to thoroughly understand this great matter of causes and conditions,🔽should break through his face and skin,
be stubborn,
and stand firm with his backbone.
Do not follow others' emotions.
Take your own doubts from the past
and stick them on your forehead.

original: 常時一似欠了人萬百貫錢。
analyzed: 常時一似欠了人萬百貫錢。
translated: Always be like someone who owes hundreds of thousands of cash to others,
and is chased by creditors.
Having nothing to repay,
you are afraid of being shamed by others.
Without urgency, they become urgent.

analyzed: 無忙得忙。 無大得大底。
translated: Without busyness, they become busy.🔽Without greatness, they become great.
Only then do they have a chance to understand.
If they say:

analyzed: 我世間文字至於九經十七史諸子百家。
translated: I know all the worldly texts, up to the Nine Classics, Seventeen Histories, and Hundred Schools of Thought.

original: 古今興亡治亂。🔽無有不知。
analyzed: 古今興亡治亂。 無有不知。
translated: I know all about the rise and fall, governance and chaos of the past and present.🔽There is nothing I don't know.
There is nothing I don't understand.

analyzed: 只有禪一般。 我也要知。
translated: Only in Chan is there one thing.🔽I want to know it.
I want to understand it.
Without the eyes to discern right and wrong,
they suddenly encounter a
haphazard Chan practitioner.
They are deceived by him,

original: 如三家村裏傳口令口耳傳授。
analyzed: 如三家村裏傳口令口耳傳授。
translated: like the game of telephone in a village, where the message is passed from ear to ear.
This is called over-the-head Chan.
It is also called drum-in-the-mouth Chan.
They take the dregs of the ancients
and certify each other with them.
One says one thing, the other replies with another.
In the end, when one of them gets in one more sentence,
they call it winning at Chan.
They are unwilling to take a step back.
Because they keep the affairs of birth and death in mind.
They are unwilling to doubt themselves.
They love to doubt others.

original: 纔聞有箇士大夫要理會這事。
analyzed: 纔聞有箇士大夫要理會這事。
translated: As soon as they hear that an official wants to understand this matter,
They first give rise to countless doubts.
They say he wants to be a good official.
And he has a fondness for sounds, colors, and pleasures.

original: 如何辦得這般事。🔽似這般底。
analyzed: 如何辦得這般事。 似這般底。
translated: How can he accomplish such a matter?
There are many like this.

original: 無一人真實把做一件未了底事。
analyzed: 無一人真實把做一件未了底事。
translated: Not a single person truly regards this as an unfinished matter.
Day and night, they are constantly preoccupied.
In their tea, meals, moments of joy, and times of anger.
In clean places and dirty places.
When the wife and children gather together.

original: 與賓客相酬酢處。🔽辦公家職事處。
analyzed: 與賓客相酬酢處。 辦公家職事處。
translated: When entertaining guests.🔽When handling official duties.
When dealing with private family matters.

analyzed: 都是第一等做工夫提撕舉覺底時節。
translated: All of these are the best times to practice, to be mindful, and to be enlightened.
In the past, General Li Wenhe,
Amidst his wealth and nobility,
Practiced Chan and had a great awakening.
When Yang Wen Gong attained Chan,
he held a position in the Hanlin Academy.
When Zhang Wujun attained Chan,
he was the transport commissioner of Jiangxi.
These three great elders
are indeed the model of not destroying worldly forms
while discussing the true nature of reality.

original: 又何曾須要去妻孥休官罷職咬菜根。
analyzed: 又何曾須要去妻孥休官罷職咬菜根。
translated: How have they ever needed to abandon their wives and children, resign their posts, eat vegetables,
degrade their appearance, lower their aspirations, avoid noise to seek tranquility,

analyzed: 然後入枯禪鬼窟裏作妄想方得悟道來。
translated: and then enter the ghost cave of dry Chan to create delusions before attaining enlightenment?
Have you not seen the words of Layman P'ang?
Just be without mind regarding myriad things,
why hinder myriad things from always surrounding you?
An iron ox is not afraid of a lion's roar,
just like a wooden man sees a flower bird.
The wooden man originally has no feelings,
the flower bird, encountering a person, is also not startled.
Mind and environment are thus, just this,
how can you worry about not accomplishing the path of enlightenment?
In the midst of worldly dust and toil,
One can forget the affairs of birth and death.
Although one has not yet broken the lacquer bucket,

original: 然亦種得般若種智之深。
analyzed: 然亦種得般若種智之深。
translated: One has still planted the deep seeds of prajñā and wisdom.
In a different world, when one appears,
One will also save mental effort.
One will also not fall into the evil realms.

original: 大勝耽染塵勞不求脫離。
analyzed: 大勝耽染塵勞不求脫離。
translated: This is much better than being attached to worldly affairs and not seeking liberation.
This matter cannot be taken lightly.
One should take it as an object of faith and respect.
Those who have this kind of understanding
Are countless.
Scholars and officials studying the Way
Are very different from us monks.

original: 出家兒父母不供甘旨六親固以棄離。
analyzed: 出家兒父母不供甘旨六親固以棄離。
translated: Monks have abandoned their parents' delicious food and their six relatives.

At such a time,
The paths of good and evil are all cut off.
When you realize it is like this,
It is just right to put effort into it.
Right here, look at this phrase.
A monk asked Zhaozhou,
Does a dog have Buddha-nature or not?

your mouth and mind will not be able to think of it.

like biting a raw iron stake with no flavor.

When you reach this point,
it is a good piece of news.

The Buddha speaks all dharmas
in order to liberate all minds.
I have no all-encompassing mind,
so what use do I have for all dharmas?
Not only is it like this in the Chan school,
the Buddha's entire canon
is all of this principle.
Sentient beings have heavy karmic hindrances,
so as soon as they get out of bed each day,

Carrying the self and others.
Deluded thoughts are upside down.
From morning to evening.

Not disgusted at all.
Suddenly giving rise to a thought.
Directed towards this gate, thinking of fame and profit.

The mind and consciousness cannot arrange it.
Then giving rise to vexation.
Early wanting to stop and rest.
Having something to come from.
Such people are countless.
The friend Shun Yuan is not like this.

original: 既知缺減界中種種虛妄。
analyzed: 既知缺減界中種種虛妄。

Judging by this,
